title: Man United Halt Arsenal
description:
The FC crew recap Manchester United's victory over Arsenal thanks to stellar performances from Fernandes, Eriksen and Rashford. Plus, the guys get fired up about a host of controversial VAR decisions, including Arsenal and West Ham's disallowed goals, and preview the UCL group stage beginning this week.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Man United defeat a red-hot Arsenal; Bowen's foul on Mendy debate; UCL group stage preview
